string.name: textmark
string.i: Shared via Diary App. Download it from here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hrishi_3331.devstudio3331.diary

resources.string:
Welcome to the diary app!


	Use this app to write one or more short - notes during your day. Simply write a few words about your workout session, events happened at school or in the office during the day. In weekends, you can write about all the fun you had meeting with friends, or being social with your family. You can use it as a Travel diary or Road journal that documents your journey. This app can also be used as daily activity log . You can make it your personal journal and have fun reading it over in few year, and share a few laughs with your friends.


	This app is pure textual, and contains no images or photos. Hence it runs fast and smooth on any Android device, and consumes minimal of available memory and disk-space!


	Do share feedback, suggestions, complaints to us. We would love to hear from you! Please do rate this app on playstore!
Recommendations for people to contact based on your message history
Backup and Restore feature is available for premium version of app only.
